name: Block Rocker
description:
Welcome to the world of the BLOCK ROCKER! Keep in mind that this game was created within the course of a week for class and is Windows-only.

If you have amusia/are tone-deaf, you may struggle quite a bit with this game's pitch-based puzzle elements.

CREDITS:
Dmytro Rudenkyy ~ Level Design, UX
Zachary Talis ~ Level Design, Code
Jennie Thomas ~ Art, Spritework

Additional playtesting done by Mat Crocco.
